billhistory.lastaction: 03/30/2017 H Referred to Investments & Financial Services: Mar 30 2017 1:18PM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the operation and administration of the Texas Bullion Depository; depository agents; and to the appropriation of money from the fees, charges, penalties, and other amounts related to the depository and deposited to the general revenue fund for that purpose.

subjects.subject: Financial--General (I0365)
State Finances--Management & Control (I0748)
TEXAS BULLION DEPOSITORY, OFFICE OF THE COMPTROLLER (V1028)
